title: Google Assistantâ€™s Guest Mode adds support for 9 more languages including Mandarin, Hindi, and Swedish
content:
Last year Google introduced “Guest Mode” to Google Assistant running on smart speakers or displays, which allows, as the name implies, guests to use your home smart devices without access to your personal information. For example, guests can control music playback, but they can’t check your next calendar appointment. It was essentially a web browser’s

The post Google Assistant’s Guest Mode adds support for 9 more languages including Mandarin, Hindi, and Swedish appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Guest Mode in Google Assistant has received support for 9 more languages, taking the total up to 16 supported languages. Read on to learn more.
